description: Single storey rear/side wrap around extension, removal of existing external staircase at the first floor level, replacement of existing patio doors at the first floor level with a sash window, three roof lights to the rear/side wrap around extension and three side facing windows along the eastern elevation
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawing title numbers: PL-54 (Existing section B-B) dated March 2017, PL-55 (Existing front and rear elevations) dated March 2017), PL-56 (Existing side E elevation) dated March 2017, PL-53 (Existing section A-A) dated March 2017, PL-51 (Existing first floor plan) dated March 2017, PL-50 (Existing ground floor plan) dated March 2017, PL-58 (Proposed first floor plan) dated March 2017, PL-60 (Proposed section A-A) dated March 2017, PL-61 (Proposed sections B-B and rear elevation) dated March 2017, PL-62 (Proposed side - E- elevation) dated March 2017, PL-62 (Proposed ground floor plan) dated June 2017, PL-57 (Proposed ground floor plan) dated March 2017, EX-00 (Site plan) adted March 2017, Design and access statement dated March 2017, preapred by Urbanroofgardens
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing building and be in accordance with the details indicated on the approved plans.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
